issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
When building an app with android:targetSdkVersion="14" or greater, Map views appear black, with only the Google Maps controls showing.

Setting android:targetSdkVersion to 13 or less restores functionality to the maps.
fields.summary: Android: ti.map does not work with android:targetSdkVersion="14" or greater

comments.body: This has also been identified here: https://developer.appcelerator.com/question/156521/timap---map-shows-only-after-clear-data-otherwise-is-emptyblack#answer-268291

[~bneil] We have not been able to reproduce this issue but it appears to be a genuine issue based on the Q&A forum threads. We would appreciate if you can provide us a simple test case and the device information so that we can try to simulate your env.
